CONTENTS.P: Selection was conducted through the Quality and cost based selection (QCBS) method as stated under the relevant World Bank’s guidelines: Selection and employment of consultants under IBRD loans and IDA credits and grants by World Bank borrowers issued in January 2011.
On 3.3.2017, request for proposal was sent to the following 6 consultants in accordance with the consultants’ short list approved by the European investment bank on 23.1.2017:
Investigación y Control de Calidad S.A. (INCOSA), Spain (JV leader)

IPSA Institut DOO, Bosnia and Herzegovina (JV partner)
BOTEK Bosphorus Technical Consulting Co., Istanbul, Turkey (JV leader)
Project Biro Utiber DOO, Serbia (JV leader)
Krebs+Kiefer Eastern Europe GmbH, Germany (JV leader)
Geing Krebs und Kiefer International and others Ltd, Macedonia (JV partner)
CPS Ingeneros, Obra Civil Y Medio Ambiente, SL., Spain (JV leader)
